{"step_by_step_thinking": "The provided documents discuss the transmission of human immunodeficiency virus (HIV) through breast milk. The risk of HIV-1 transmission through breastfeeding is estimated to be 29% for mothers who acquired HIV-1 postnatally and 14% for those infected prenatally, over and above transmission in utero or during delivery.
